text: 14:17 Matyu 10:20; Jon 16:13; Rom 8:26; 1 Korin 2:14; 1 Jon 2:27; 4:6Ezɨ Akurvazir kam a Godɨn Duam, a guizɨn akabav geir Duam. Ezɨ nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba me an ganighan koghɨva, egh a gɨfoghan kogham, kamaghɨn me a inighan kogham. Ezɨ iarara, a ia ko iti, egh a ian navir averiabar aven ikiam. Kamaghɨn ia a gɨfo.
